page.shortlink: css layout container properties layout type property
page.description: Defines the type of layout to use. The Layout Container can be a 'Flow', 'Freeform', or 'Column' container.

item.name: Flow
item.description: Controls in the Layout Container "flow" from one line to the next based on the width of each control.

item.name: Freeform
item.description: Control layout is explicitly defined using HTML.

item.name: Column
item.description: Controls are placed in one or more columns.
